Guillotine Fortress Watchman Roderik:
How is it progressing? Kill Sadiac, Turan, Nagdoo, Haskal, Gazem, Rosenia's Divine Spirit, Kelbara, Pafuron, Krutati, Alluring Irene, and Isaad, and collect 40 Deadman's Flesh.
While you're at it, the Scaldisect the Furious may show up. I trust you to take care of this nuisance as well. Even once would be good enough for now.
